text: The Fantastic Four is an unreleased movie produced by Roger Corman. It is the first movie based on the Marvel Comics team. It was completed in 1994 and can only be found in bootlegs. ==Cast== * Alex Hyde-White as Reed Richards / Mr. Fantastic * Rebecca Staab as Sue Storm-Richards / Invisible Woman ** Mercedes McNab as Young Sue Storm * Jay Underwood as Johnny Storm / Human Torch ** Phillip Van Dyke as Young Johnny Storm * Michael Bailey Smith as Ben Grimm ** Carl Ciarfalio as The Thing * Joseph Culp as Victor Von Doom / Dr. Doom * Kat Green as Alicia Masters * Ian Trigger as The Jeweler * Annie Gagen as May Storm ==Other websites== * * * Category:1990s superhero movies Category:American movies Category:Fantastic Four movies Category:1990s science fiction movies Category:American action movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Movies set in Manhattan Category:Movies set in New York City Category:American superhero movies Category:American independent movies
title: The Fantastic Four (unreleased movie)
